sentences.english: How do I dispose my used oils and greases?
sentences.chinese: 我該如何處理廢油和廢潤滑脂？

sentences.english: A solution may soon come from using waste cooking oil.
sentences.chinese: 不久就會擁有解決方法，用廢烹調油生產生物柴油。

sentences.english: A new method to recover silver from silver-bearing waste catalytic agent is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了從含銀的廢催化劑中回收白銀的一種新方法。

sentences.english: In this paper, waste wood flour was used to reinforce high-density polyethylene ( HDPE).
sentences.chinese: 本研究採用廢木粉爲填料增強改性高密度聚乙烯。

sentences.english: The customers'demand in collecting society-source WEEE was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了廢電子電器收集中存在的顧客需求。

sentences.english: You would throw the magazine in the wastebasket.
sentences.chinese: 你會將這本雜誌扔到廢紙簍裏去。

sentences.english: Two reliable sources of toys are dresser tops and wastebaskets. There are several types of cat toys.
sentences.chinese: 有兩個可靠的玩具來源，分別是梳妝檯上面和廢紙簍。

sentences.english: In addition, the countermeasures for improvement of recovery of domestic scrap lead are presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了改善中國廢鉛實得率的對策。

sentences.english: Waste vegetable oil collection box with a few plastic bottles of waste oil left by customers.
sentences.chinese: 廢食用油收集箱與幾個塑料瓶廢油遺留下來的客戶。

sentences.english: When sending faxes to your clients you should include a cover sheet.
sentences.chinese: 傳真給客戶時，你應該附上廢戽頁。

sentences.english: Printing and dyeing wastewater was treated by the two wastes, iron scraps and fly ash.
sentences.chinese: 利用廢鐵屑與粉煤灰兩種廢物集合處理印染廢水。

sentences.english: In this paper, the advanced processes for recovering and utilizing waste PET bottles are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種先進的廢聚酯瓶回收利用的工藝過程。

sentences.english: The technologies of using waste cooking oil in diesel engines are presented.
sentences.chinese: 綜述在柴油機上使用廢烹調油的技術。

sentences.english: These documents are useless - they are only wastebasket fodder .
sentences.chinese: 這些檔毫無用處，只配扔進廢紙簍裏。

sentences.english: The weakened battery was no longer discharging.
I tasted the paste in haste and cast it on the waste plaster.
sentences.chinese: 我匆倉促品味了漿糊然後將其丟在廢泥灰上。
